title: MOVES-Lazard appoints former Bunge CEO Alberto Weisser as senior advisor

content: LONDON/PARIS Lazard banker Vincent Le Stradic recently took a break from his job advising Europe's top telecoms companies on deals to help little-known French start-up Sigfox raise 100 million euros.
name: Lazard Ltd
title: No deal too small for Lazard’s $500 billion banker

content: ATHENS  Feb 13 Greece's Finance Ministry said on Friday the investment group Lazard is working with Greece on a pro bono basis.
name: Lazard Ltd
title: Greek finance ministry says Lazard is working with it "free of charge"

content: PARIS Matthieu Pigasse  head of investment bank Lazard in Paris which is advising the Greek government on its debt restructuring  said on Tuesday the troika imposing austerity on Greece was totally mistaken and had driven the country's economy into a wall.
name: Lazard Ltd
title: Pigasse  head of Lazard Paris  says troika 'all wrong' on Greece

content: PARIS  Feb 10 Matthieu Pigasse  head of investment bank Lazard in Paris which is advising the Greek government on its debt restructuring  said on Tuesday the troika imposing austerity on Greece was totally mistaken and had driven the country's economy into a wall.
name: Lazard Ltd
title: CORRECTED-Pigasse  head of Lazard Paris  says troika "all wrong" on Greece

content: LONDON  Feb 5 Soon after politicians from the far-left Syriza party won power in Greece they said they had hired Lazard to advise them on restructuring their debt.
name: Lazard Ltd
title: RPT-Greek radicals play it safe with debt advisers Lazard

content: Investment bank and asset manager Lazard Ltd  reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit as a jump in corporate dealmaking boosted M&A advisory fees.
name: Lazard Ltd
title: Lazard profit beats estimates on higher advisory fees

content: Feb 5 Investment bank and asset manager Lazard Ltd reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit as a jump in corporate dealmaking boosted M&A advisory fees.
name: Lazard Ltd
title: UPDATE 1-Lazard profit beats estimates on higher advisory fees

content: Feb 5 Investment bank and asset manager Lazard Ltd reported a 57 percent rise in adjusted quarterly profit due to a jump in advisory fees from higher M&A activity.
name: Lazard Ltd
title: Lazard adjusted profit rises 57 pct on higher advisory fees

content: LONDON  Jan 28 (IFR) - Ukraine has hired Lazard to advise on talks with bondholders about a possible restructuring of its debt  sources close to the situation said on Wednesday.
name: Lazard Ltd
title: UPDATE 1-Ukraine appoints Lazard as restructuring adviser - sources

content: WASHINGTON  Jan 12 Antonio Weiss  an investment banker who was a controversial nominee for a top post at the U.S. Treasury Department  has decided to withdraw from consideration  the White House said on Monday.
name: Lazard Ltd
title: UPDATE 2-U.S. Treasury nominee Weiss withdraws from consideration-White House
